website_summaries.verdict: Vibrant, cheerful set of two 17-inch square and two 12-by-20-inch lumbar pillows that also match an outdoor rug.
pros: Well-made and nicely shaped pillows that aren’t flat make this value-priced set of 4 outdoor pillows worth the price
cons: Occasional reports of fading and loose stitching

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful just like the pictures. This pillow set is well constructed. Very good quality and waterproof fabric.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillows
customer_reviews.text: Bought these pillows to go with this rug in the picture. Such a close match. Very excited about my porch now
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, the look great in my patio furniture. Especially great paired with the matching rug.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Floral Success
customer_reviews.text: Love these on my patio...I was sprucing things up this spring because my daughter was getting married in May and we knew we would have people in the house and on the patio. Beautiful colors...great quality....love the two sizes...I have the square ones on the swing....and the rectangle ones on two of the chairs for the table. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Leta F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cushion - great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cushions - well worth the price. I purchase another set. Very pleased with 6
customer_reviews.author: dlmar10

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Has these for a year now and love the color and that they don’t fade in the sun!
customer_reviews.author: OperaSinger

customer_reviews.title: These pillows add the perfect touch to my outdoor sofa
customer_reviews.text: I just received these pillows yesterday and they are lovely, and add a great pop of color to my outdoor sofa. I would definitely not consider these soft. That said, I have different expectations of these since they’re made for outdoor and need to be weather resistant in order to hold up. I think these are well made, look great, and offer nice lumbar support😊
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Loved the price, loved the pillows...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly (which I wasn’t expecting, given that we’re in the middle of a pandemic), they were packaged well and they look exactly as they are pictured. A great addition to the (black) chairs on my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillows
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These pillows are just what I needed to complete our outdoor living space! The colors are so vibrant! I purchased two orders and I’m not disappointed at all! Now to find a rug that matches lol
customer_reviews.author: BeachLovers

customer_reviews.title: Love These Pillows
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy these pillows because of how expensive they are, but I’m glad I did. They look great on my rattan deck furniture! They provide just enough support to make the chairs and love seat comfortable and add a nice pop of color to deck. We’ve had quite a bit of rain since I’ve gotten these and they’ve held up just fine to the weather. Overall very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Mother’s Day gift
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift for my mother in law. She loves them and they were what she was looking for but they seem to high of a price for what you get. I would expect something like this to be in the $20-$25. They are good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: cdMN

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was initially disappointed to receive the incorrect pattern. However, the seller corrected the error and sent the replacements immediately. These are beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color
customer_reviews.text: These look good and are sturdy for outdoors. Stuffed a bit too much but they will probably loosen over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Esslinger

customer_reviews.title: Great for outside lawn furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great for outside lawn furniture. Love the colors for all seasons
customer_reviews.author: Mark A

customer_reviews.title: Great shape and vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: I like that the pillows aren't flat - they have great shape and plenty of structure. The colors are great too, very vibrant & the pattern is on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and colors
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with four actual pillows not just the pillow covers The pillows themselves are plumb and generously filled. Colors on the pillows are true to listing
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Blake

customer_reviews.title: Color perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my outside furniture, the color is bright and the size is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: These pillows were perfect for an outdoor seating set we purchased for our covered deck. They are vibrant in color and made well. The colors were exactly the same colors in person as what I saw online.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Schurz

customer_reviews.title: Prettier and more colorful in person
customer_reviews.text: These are prettier and more colorful in person than the photo depicts and it goes great with my outside carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Houck

customer_reviews.title: Indoor/ outdoor pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great pillows! Arrived looking like the pictures showed! Colors are vibrant and they’re holding up to the elements perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with pillows but I would not put soft because they r your typical outdoor cushions. They r as expected and look great with a lot of different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, fluffy, and add just the right finishing touch to my deck furniture
customer_reviews.author: Leighann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very pretty! I really am enjoying them! The colors are very vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shephard

customer_reviews.title: nice pillows
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice outdoor pillows, they brighten up my deck!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Oh So Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mixture of colors, allowing decorating easy. You have several colors to match your and other accessories. Oh, and the color is bright and pretty. So out Dorsey (if that's a word). 😍
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, just as show, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: High quality pillows that I used for my outdoor furniture to give it some flare.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Sandra48

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pillows for my outdoor patio. They are Beautiful and well made. I receive compliments on these pillows all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match up with patio decor.
customer_reviews.text: The pillows were bought as a gift. They were a perfect fit for her patio furniture. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R Ginzel

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors! They are kinda small and a little stiff but love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: They are great on my couch. Well made and love how bright and cheerful they are
customer_reviews.author: Ashleelee819

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. They are high quality and have great color! I use them outside and they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our white outdoor daybed. Matches beautifully with our turquoise chairs and adds a cheery feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Backyard Bum

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Pillows
customer_reviews.text: These are great pillows, well made. We have them on our porch swing and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory McKinney

customer_reviews.title: bright beautiful pillows
customer_reviews.text: these pillows really brighten up my outdoor space. perfect accent to my beige cushions and dark brown chairs
customer_reviews.author: LISA HUGHES

customer_reviews.title: Great pattern colors!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased two sets for my patio furniture. The two sizes were perfect for our needs. They brighten up our patio :)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Colors are a bit lighter than the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Colors are a bit lighter than the picture but they look great on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Sykora

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the pillows
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillows...just what I wanted for a orange living room..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pillows!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, nice coots and held up nicely on deck furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors and after being outside all summer they did not fade. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: Melva Kinkel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Only negative comment is that colors have faded already in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa white

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Outdoor porch furniture. Bright vibrant colors compliments a wide array of colors. Superb quality.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne perucca

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful and well made!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are for my outdoor furniture. Beautiful colors! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Gail Toomey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty porch pillows
customer_reviews.text: The colors are bright and I like the different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Ranessa Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Have these out on outdoor couches and the color is still vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Kellen L.

customer_reviews.title: Best pillows ever!!!  Highly recommend buying them!  I plan to buy more as gifts!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these pillows in April 2018. I live in the deep South where it is either scorching hot or humid as heck! These pillows are outstanding, the colors are bright, the material is awesome! I brought them in last night because they were looking kind of dirty from the dust, threw them in our front loading washer. I washed them in cold water on the delicate setting. Dried them on low and they came out looking and feeling brand new!! I plan on buying more as gifts, what a great find!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheerful colors
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some brightly colored pillows to brighten up my great room for the summer. They are indoor/outdoor fabric so not very soft, but I paired them with softer pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Betse OKeefe

customer_reviews.title: Loved then
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to soend almost $60 on outdoor pillows but these are beautiful. The colors are bright & the pillows are larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: whitney b

customer_reviews.title: Super cute pillow for patio!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. I needed a pop of color to spruce up my grey outdoor furniture - and these are the perfect solution. They look great, gorgeous colors and did exactly what I wanted them to!
customer_reviews.author: SStrauss

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great pillows. Brighten up the room and look great on my love seat. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kellner

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty and go well with my outside couch. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: beardog

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are wonderful sizes and the pattern is ADORABLE! THEY ARE PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: tbel123

customer_reviews.title: Patio Pillows
customer_reviews.text: The constant battering from the sun kills our patio pillows every couple years, These seem firm, well made and the price was good. I expect 18-24 months from them.
customer_reviews.author: oh-so-busy

customer_reviews.title: Great color and design!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors on these pillows. A bit firm but great for a decorative look.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful must have outdoor pillows!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are vibrant on color and very comfortable! Great service from the company too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lenzen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality in the material, sewing and stuffing. My favorite thing about the pillows is the vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The print on the pillows is as pictured, very colorful.
customer_reviews.text: They are being used as outdoor lumbar pillows for bar stools.
customer_reviews.author: nancy malone

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows seem very well made. Not super soft but not firm which is perfect for what I wanted. Colors are even prettier in person.
customer_reviews.author: LB 5252

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set of Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant and beautiful - like the lumbar as well in set. Colors are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and she was very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pillows
customer_reviews.text: These pillows look great with black chairs. They are comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Apple

product_meta.title: Indoor Outdoor Set of 4 (2-17"x17" Square and 20"x12") Lumbar Decorative Toss Throw Pillows - Yellow, Orange, Blue, Pink Bright Artistic Floral
product_meta.description:
From our Resort Spa Home Décor Collection: 

Set of 4 (2 - 17"x17" Square & 2 – 20”x12” Lumbar) Pillows Indoor Outdoor Fabric.

 

 *  Made of high quality weather and wear fabric 
 *  Water Resistant, Fade Resistant, Soil Resistant UV-treated fabric for improved fade resistance Filled with Soft, Plush, Hypo-allergenic 100% Poly Fiber Fill Easy care: Sponge wash with soap and water, air dry; fast drying

 

We pride ourselves on our exceptional quality USA made textile products with a great value. Our company was formed from the success of our 100% Customer Satisfied Guarantee. We make every effort to exceed our customers’ expectations. 



 * Best quality
 * Best value
 * Best selection anywhere
 * Guaranteed



Wonderfully made in the USA

Just relax with resort hospitality outdoor living in the comfort of your own home. RSH Décor offers a variety of cushions, pillows, and furniture made for any outdoor setting. Our prompt customer service, superior quality, and unbeatable pricing cannot be matched. Thank you for supporting our manufacturing plant in the upstate of South Carolina.

Visit our Amazon store for a variety of decorative accent throw pillows, indoor and outdoor cushions and decor.
feature_bullets: Perfect for use both Indoors and Out!
Give your Porch or Home an easy, quick, fresh makeover with our Decorative Pillows & Cushions!
UV resistant, fade resistant, stain resistant fabric - Functional and easy way to update your Patio, Deck, Porch or Home Decor.
Set of 4 - (2) 17" x 17" Square and (2) 20" x 12"Lumbar Pillows Filled with Soft, Premium Poly Fiber-fill
Stylish ~ Comfortable ~ Easy Maintenance ~ Wonderfully Made in the USA
